body_html:
This is happening for me while saving a checkpoint with or without write_meta_graph=False on tf.0.8.0rc0 on Ubuntu 14.04. The checkpoint appears to be in a temporary state just before the crash occurs.

-rw-rw-r-- 1 ubuntu ubuntu 590993388 May 11 07:51 gan.ckpt-1400
-rw-rw-r-- 1 ubuntu ubuntu 67731865 May 11 07:59 gan.ckpt-1500.tempstate5056164176772455283
body_text:
This is happening for me while saving a checkpoint with or without write_meta_graph=False on tf.0.8.0rc0 on Ubuntu 14.04.  The checkpoint appears to be in a temporary state just before the crash occurs.
-rw-rw-r-- 1 ubuntu ubuntu 590993388 May 11 07:51 gan.ckpt-1400

body:
This is happening for me while saving a checkpoint with or without `write_meta_graph=False` on tf.0.8.0rc0 on Ubuntu 14.04.  The checkpoint appears to be in a temporary state just before the crash occurs.

```
-rw-rw-r-- 1 ubuntu ubuntu 590993388 May 11 07:51 gan.ckpt-1400
-rw-rw-r-- 1 ubuntu ubuntu 67731865 May 11 07:59 gan.ckpt-1500.tempstate5056164176772455283
```
